name: Easy Javascript Tips
description: A short over view for beginners on quick and easy javascript tips for you to use during bootcamps.

comments.name: John Doe
comments.comment: This is a great short blog for beginners to learn javascript.

comments.name: Jane Doe
comments.comment: I am a web developer and this is a great blog for me to reference javascript tips and commands.

name: The How To Guide To Bootcamps
description: A personal trip through a short 12 week bootcamp by someone who has never coded! Come see what it was like!

comments.name: John Doe
comments.comment: This is a great way to show how it is to take a bootcamp when you are on the ground level for learning.

comments.name: Jane Doe
comments.comment: As a graduate of a bootcamp I can say this blog is very relateable and prepares you for the fire hose of information you are about to recieve.

name: HTML and CSS Tips and Tricks for Beginners
description: This is a quick and easy guide to reference as beginners for syntax and styling help from HTML to CSS.

comments.name: John Doe
comments.comment: This is a great short blog for beginners to learn HTML and CSS.

comments.name: Jane Doe
comments.comment: I am a web developer and this is a great blog for me to reference HTML and CSS tips and tricks.
